name: Brick Breaker: Block Escape Puzzle Game
name_original: Brick Breaker: Block Escape Puzzle Game
description:
Easy to play for all generation
Classic casual game that you and your friends can enjoy together!

Clear all bricks in various modes at once using your perfect angle.
We know you have the genes for it!!

Way back home and in the subway or Bus, enjoy Brick Blast : Ping Ping

▶ Brick Blast : Ping Ping ! Official Fan Page : https://www.facebook.com/superbox01

- This game supports '한국어', 'Indonesian', 'Bahasa malay', 'English', '日本語', '中文简体', '中文繁體', 'Deutsch', 'français', 'Español', 'ไทย', 'Русский', 'Arabic', 'Portuguese', 'Turkish', 'Italian'.

【Game Features】
◐ An addictive game enjoyed by people all around the world!
◐ Clean, stylish, quality graphic with a dreamy atmosphere.
◐ Excellent game elements for high pleasure and brain development by destroying bricks.
◐ No Wi-Fi? No problem! Play anytime without an internet connection.
◐ Supports 16 languages.
◐ A small game that can be downloaded by any device!
◐ Supports all tablets.

【How to play 】
◐ Swipe the given ball to the brick to destroy it
◐ Match the angle and remove some blocks in one shot.

- This game is acceptable for purchasing the items partially. When purchasing the items, the additional costs could be occurred and limited Consumer Right of Defense according to the item types.

▶ Let's Enjoy SUPERBOX ◀
